sentiment_score_definition: x <= -0.35: Bearish; -0.35 < x <= -0.15: Somewhat-Bearish; -0.15 < x < 0.15: Neutral; 0.15 <= x < 0.35: Somewhat_Bullish; x >= 0.35: Bullish
relevance_score_definition: 0 < x <= 1, with a higher score indicating higher relevance.

feed.title: TruGolf Links Franchisee Takes on Developing all of Long Island
feed.summary: TruGolf Links Franchising, LLC announced that Giovanni "Gio" Dinsay, a New York-based physical therapist, will become the Regional Developer for all of Long Island. Dinsay, who previously opened 20 healthcare clinics, will develop 50 or more TruGolf Links locations and also holds the distribution rights for TruGolf products. This expansion is part of TruGolf's strategy to grow its indoor golf simulator concept nationwide through a regional developer model.

feed.title: TruGolf Holdings Inc. Plays Key Role in Award-Winning Sky Sports Golf Broadcast of The Open Championship
feed.summary: TruGolf Holdings Inc. announced its pivotal contribution to Sky Sports Golf’s award-winning broadcast of The Open Championship, providing advanced simulation and visualization technology for data-driven storytelling. This technology, utilizing the proprietary E6 Apex engine, rendered hyper-accurate digital recreations of Royal Portrush Golf Club, leading to the broadcast receiving the “Best Visual Storytelling Using Data & Insight” award. TruGolf's innovation aligns with the growing golf simulator market, projected to reach nearly $4 billion by 2032, and the same award-winning technology is now available to its customers.

feed.title: TruGolf Re-imagines the Driving Range:
feed.summary: TruGolf Holdings Inc. (NASDAQ: TRUG) unveiled TruGolf Range, a next-generation indoor range platform designed to revolutionize golf practice. This innovation combines realistic simulation, intelligent data analysis, and efficient facility design, transforming driving ranges from cost centers into profitable engines. TruGolf Range will officially debut at the 2026 PGA Show, offering an immersive, data-driven experience for golfers and a sustainable, scalable business model for operators.

feed.title: TruGolf Links Signs Inaugural Franchise Development Deal with New Jersey Businessman
feed.summary: TruGolf Links, a wholly owned subsidiary of TruGolf Holdings, Inc., has signed its first regional development deal with New Jersey entrepreneur Nicholas "Nick" Reimondo. The agreement grants Reimondo the rights to develop 40 new TruGolf Links centers in Central and Northern New Jersey, and Bucks County, Pennsylvania. This move aims to aggressively expand TruGolf's indoor golf simulator presence in the region, leveraging Reimondo's extensive business and hospitality background.
